name: Spin The Bottle! Truth Or Dare
name_original: Spin The Bottle! Truth Or Dare
description:
Are you a fan of the games like Spin the Bottle and Truth or Dare? If you are this is the perfect app for you.

Tap to spin the bottle. When it stops spinning the player it's pointing at must choose to complete either a Truth Or Dare.

Contains hundreds of fun Truth and Dares ranging from clean to dirty (18+).

With 3 different game modes this Spin the Bottle and Truth or Dare app is suitable for all ages!

Features:
- Hundreds of Truth and Dares
- Add your own clean or dirty truth or dares!
- Spin the bottle to decide on who's turn it is
- Frequently updated with more content
- 3 different game modes including Teens and Adult (dirty dares, 18+)

This is the perfect Spin the Bottle and Truth or Dare app for teenagers and adults.

What are you waiting for? Grab your friends and have a game of Spin the Bottle - Truth or Dare.
